tweets.html:
OMG! Nobody tell me what happened on The Voice or Dancing With The Stars!! (Because I really don't give a shit.)

— cybernetic sarCC of xmas past from the future (@sarCCastro) April 24, 2012

I hope Ellis does LSD on tonight's #Smash

i love that everyone on #Smash hates Ellis as much as we do.

nine minutes in and #Smash hasn't made me want to burn down the world. this could be a good night.
